snippet: Plaquemines Parish, the marshy peninsula of southeastern Louisiana, was the first landing point of Hurricane Isaac and the scene of perhaps its most thorough destruction.
abstract: Plaquemines Parish, a marshy peninsula of southeastern Louisiana, was the first landing point of Hurricane Isaac and is the scene of perhaps its most thorough destruction; residents of the parish have weathered event after devastating event, including a string of hurricanes and the BP oil spill.
lead_paragraph: Plaquemines Parish, the marshy peninsula of southeastern Louisiana, was the first landing point of Hurricane Isaac and the scene of perhaps its most thorough destruction.

headline.seo: Isaac Is Latest Blow to Swampy South Louisiana
headline.main: In Louisiana, the Water Gives, and Takes Away
headline.print_headline: Marshy Parish, Split: Water Gives, and Takes
